meanings.definition: Large herbivorous mammals with one or two horns on the nose.
meanings.sent1: Rhinoceroses are big animals that eat plants.
meanings.sent2: I saw a family of rhinoceroses at the zoo.
meanings.sent3: The rhinoceroses at the party were the center of attention.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as a herd of rhinoceroses.
meanings.sent5: The rhinoceroses' horns make them look like ancient warriors.

meanings.sent1: The rhinoceroses gathered together for safety.
meanings.sent2: A crash of rhinoceroses moved through the savannah.
meanings.sent3: The rhinoceroses' meeting was quite noisy.
meanings.sent4: The unity of the rhinoceroses was unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The stampede of rhinoceroses was a sight to behold.

meanings.sent1: The rhinoceroses' skin is tough and thick.
meanings.sent2: The poachers targeted the rhinoceroses for their skin.
meanings.sent3: The rhinoceroses' skin felt like armor.
meanings.sent4: The value of the rhinoceroses' skin was undeniable.
meanings.sent5: The texture of the rhinoceroses' skin was rough yet protective.
